Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in South Charleston
There was one other sighting in South Charleston on or around May 5th 2012
Summary: and then seen with binoculars; rotated without any extensions; then rotated with "things" sticking out of object. First looked like a balloon; then blimp; then went up out of sight without binoculars; then with, spotted. Smaller
divs: sighting detailssitting on my back porch enjoying the evening. just a large black thing appeared in the direction i was looking (westerly). possibly a black, large balloon? then a blimp that became kind of "wavy;?" when i got my binoculars, i couldn't locate it; then found it very high up in the sky; moving in a straight direction, while at times rotating while appearing to stop, with "things" sticking out of object, looking somewhat like a bug with legs, then again without anything sticking out. by then it had moved in a direction (se) disappearing behind the leaves of my large trees. i called my friend to search her skies and they saw nothing. my feelings during this was that it looked quite a bit like the "flying people\witches" i've seen on internet reports of south america. never seen anything like it. no sound. very strange.
